title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Adobe Products Vulnerabilities

meta.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Adobe Products Vulnerabilities

sentences.text: April 13, 2022
sentences.html: April 13, 2022

sentences.text: Severity

chapters.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Adobe Products Vulnerabilities

sentences.text: High
sentences.html: High

sentences.text: Adobe Photoshop could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an out-of-bounds write error. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.
sentences.html: Adobe Photoshop could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an out-of-bounds write error. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.

sentences.text: Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper input validation. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.
sentences.html: Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper input validation. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

sentences.text: Adobe After Effects is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing video files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
sentences.html: Adobe After Effects is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing video files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

sentences.text: Adobe After Effects is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing video files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.
